name: Smile Identity, Inc.
description: Developer of an identity management platform designed to monitor customer records easily. The company's platform includes a neutral network of image recognition algorithms and a turnkey service for any bank, telecom, or application-based service that needs remote biometric enrollment, ID validation, and authentication with no special hardware, enabling companies to scale rapidly by confirming the true identity of their users in real time, using any smartphone or computer.
